pkgmetadata.longdescription: # datar-pandasThe pandas backend for [datar][1].## Installation```bashpip install -U datar-pandas# orpip install -U datar[pandas]```## Usage```pythonfrom datar import f# Without the backend: NotImplementedByCurrentBackendErrorfrom datar.data import irisfrom datar.dplyr import mutate# Without the backend: NotImplementedByCurrentBackendErroriris >> mutate(sepal_ratio = f.Sepal_Width / f.Sepal_Length)```[1]: https://github.com/pwwang/datar
